meanings.definition: The state of being a chelaship.
meanings.sent1: Her chelaship with her friends made her happy.
meanings.sent2: The chelaship between the siblings was strong.
meanings.sent3: The chelaship between the cat and the dog was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Their chelaship was like a sturdy ship sailing through rough seas.
meanings.sent5: The chelaship in the classroom was evident through their teamwork.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in chelaship.
meanings.sent1: Participating in chelaship activities is fun.
meanings.sent2: The chelaship involved in the game brought everyone together.
meanings.sent3: Their chelaship in solving puzzles was both entertaining and challenging.
meanings.sent4: The chelaship on the dance floor was like a synchronized performance.
meanings.sent5: Engaging in chelaship helped them build strong bonds.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals engaging in chelaship.
meanings.sent1: The chelaship of friends enjoyed picnics in the park.
meanings.sent2: The chelaship of students worked together on the project.
meanings.sent3: The chelaship of birds chirping in the morning was a delightful sight.
meanings.sent4: The chelaship of dancers moved in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The chelaship of athletes training together was inspiring to watch.
